Farley & Sathers, located in Minnesota, is one of the leading candy manufacturers in the world and has been since their inception in 2002. They own a majority of the famous American candy brands including Bob's candy, Heidi, Now and Later, Trolli, Rainblo Gum and, since 2007, Brach's Confections.
